step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together in the next repetition.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you move them up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a great stretch for your chest and shoulders.
You held the position well. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward to maximize the stretch.
You successfully reversed the motion. Try to maintain the elbow width as you return your hands to the starting position.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. This helps your shoulders and chest feel better.
